comment: Many people don't give Dr. Rauton the credit she deserves. If you treat her with respect and show interest in what she's doing, she will go out of her way to help you. Attendance isn't mandatory, but she seems to favor the students that attend and there are the occasional pop quizzes that you can't afford to miss. Grading gets released fast too!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Beware of pop quizzes--Caring

comment: She is very strictly no phones and no laptops. Will call you out in the middle of class for this. Self-assigned seats. Watch out for pop quizzes, but she does give you the vocab ahead of time. Her lectures were vague, read the textbook. She does treat you like a high schooler. Just be patient and put in a little effort and it'll be okay.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: During the Coronavirus pandemic. A lot started to happen outside of school and I missed 2 assignments at the end of the semester after not missing one all year and she would not open them back up and that dropped my grade a whole letter.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Graded by few things--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Dr. Rauton does not allow phones and gives assigned seats. Despite that, the class is very easy. Her tests are just like the quizlet that she posts for you. There are pop quizzes, but if you pay attention they are easy. Her lectures are straight from the textbook on a powerpoint. She is definitely old school.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: She is really rude and mean and treats you as if youre in high school. Dont dare ask a question that sounds like your testing her knowledge or she will go off. She hates phones so dont use them. Otherwise class side EASY A just turn in stuff on time
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Easiest class ever. 3 tests and a final that are exactly like quizlets she posts, so if you study them youre guaranteed an A on every test. I only showed up when I felt like there was going to be a pop quiz, and on test days, and got an A. Only complaint is no phones or laptops allowed in class, and thats partly why I barely showed up.
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Every exam she gives you a quizlet which is all the questions. Only thing different is the way some of them are worded. This class is easy but annoying. She doesn't allow phones or computers out during class. She tries to make jokes and sometimes they are funny. She does pop quizzes so you'll need to go to class but you are not graded on showing up
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Professor Rauton is the kind of teacher who doesnt appear to enjoy what she does. She follows the powerpoint pretty closely and seems restless when students ask questions. She highly discourages cellphone usage and doesnt care for tardy students. Stay off your phone completely during her lectures, and study the quizlets for the tests. Easy A.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: She is not very understanding and does not listen to her students. Read the text book and you will be A ok, but her lectures are extremely boring and it seems like she forgets a lot of stuff and uses her powerpoint as a crutch. I feel like she teaches as if she is just ready to retire.
rating_tags: Test heavy--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Assigned seats. No phones, earbuds, laptops. Test are exactly like quizlets. Gave 2 pop quizzes . Goes WAY too fast through PP so don't bother taking notes. Read the terms for each chapter in textbook, study them, study quizlet two nights before test, and show up to all pop quizzes- you'll pass with an A.( I missed a pop quiz and dropped my grade)
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: As long as you read the book, you will understand the material. She is lecture heavy but she does not teach the material in a good way. Attendance does not affect your grade, but she will yell at you if you miss a certain amount of classes. You will have assigned seats and she treats her students like they are in middle school. I do not recommend.
rating_tags: Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Lets see... if youre one to just show up and not care about anything but the grade, shes tolerable. Just do the homework, show up every lecture, and study quizlet (exact same as her test word for word.) HOWEVER she doesnt allow phones, computers, earbuds... nothing. No coffee. Shes disrespectful and seems to not know her own material. Thanks.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: Dont take her unless you want to go back to high school! While her class is super easy and her tests are a breeze, she is disrespectful to students, is judgemental and goes through her PP too quickly to take notes. IF you're ok with assigned seating and "the bell doesnt dismiss you, I do" then take her. If not stay far away!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Lecture heavy

comment: This lady is very disrespectful to her students and treats them more like 12 year olds than college students. She assigns seats, counts you as absent if you are late, doesn't allow phones, and nothing she teaches in class is on the test. Sometimes her study guides are like the tests, but it is not reliable. Definitely would not recommend.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Test heavy--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: She goes very heavy with her lectures, doesn't give you time to write notes. Pop quizzes are literally pop quizzes you wont know when youre going to have them so you have to go to every single class. Shes very strict on attendance and will call you out on it. But tests are easy and so are online assignments.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Beware of pop quizzes--Lecture heavy

comment: Dr. Rauton is a solid choice if you're taking an Intro to Psych class. She grades you by many things--online homework, in-class assignments, tests, and pop-quizzes. The pop-quizzes aren't really "pop" because she hints/tells you and they're T/F questions--most answers are true because she's so sweet she doesn't like to trick people.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria--Caring

comment: This class is super boring, especially during lectures. She is very lecture heavy and half of the time, you are going to want to fall asleep. Your grade is based on the online hw that is easy (google), and the pop quizzes, easy, and the tests, easy (quizlet). If you do not show for any of those things she will give a 0 nd can't be made up.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Dr. Rauton was a good professor but there were pop quizzes that she wouldn't tell you about, more specifically what they would be on. The class consisted of 4 tests, 5 pop quizzes, and homework that was known as Learning Curve. She also got off topic a lot and it seemed like she didn't know what she was talking about herself.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Welcome back to high school. NO CELLPHONES! Bell does not dismiss you I do kinda woman. She is super nice don't get me wrong but her point system didn't play in my favor. Made all A's on assignments but will end with a B because she goes by points and I missed a class due to traffic. Get ready to read or you won't pass, easy class however.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: She is really nice. Her lectures hard hard to listen to some days because it is directly off a powerpoint. Pop quizzes will ruin your grade so make sure you are on top of the reading. The test are easy as long as you follow the study guide. She hates phones and laptops so don't even attempt to hide it.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She reads from lecture slides every class, and she puts them online so you really don't have to go but she does random quizzes and assignments in class that are graded so going to class is probably your best bet. She does a review before tests in class, provides study guides and SI sessions with her TAs. Its an easy class to pass just do the work!
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Her class is heavy lecture which is really boring, but the class is super easy. The tests are exactly like the study guide she provided. Shes strict about phones except on review days. Attendance is mandatory but not detailed how its counted towards grade. Theres pop quizzes that are easy and in class assignments that cant be made up
rating_tags: Participation matters--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: It is super unclear as to how much attendance is counted. Test is pretty much verbatim the study guide. Quizzes are t/f and sometimes almost all true which will make you second guess yourself. She's a sweet old lady and its an easy class.
rating_tags: Caring

comment: If you are a STEM major and are only taking this class for general education credit, TAKE HER! You do not have to take notes, but attendance is mandatory. To get an A or a high B memorize the study guides because they are almost the same as the test. No final.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She's kind of funny and She lectures extremely heavy, will mark you absent if she even thinks your on your electronics! Shes absolutely nuts, you have to ask to use restroom and let her know of an emergency ahead of time? How??! It's an emergency for a reason! Take someone else, she's a walking contradiction and headache.  Wont miss her one bit.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Avoid this prof for Psychology at all costs I am an A Engineering student and had to withdraw from this class you should take anyone else. Lectures are boring and put you to sleep. Plus no electronics allowed during lecture.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: The course is easy and she gives you study guides that are exactly like the test. If you go to class everyday you'll pass. She's an older prof so sometimes she'll get confused and say contradicting things. Ex: she went on a rant about how social media makes us antisocial, but on the test the answer was that it make us more social.
rating_tags: Participation matters--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This class was SO easy. Her test are literally straight from her study guide! Occasionally she would do some pop quizzes, but they were very easy. She is a very sweet lady and a great teacher.
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This class is very easy to make an A in. I made straight A's the entire semester and skipped class occasionally. Go to the study session before tests and she reviews the correct answers to the study guide which is where the test comes from. No cell phones or laptops during class is the only negative thing. Overall nice lady, I would take her again!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: I dont know what the people below are saying, this professor is the SWETEST lady and her study guides directly are from her tests... Make sure you study them and you'll make an A. It is a joke for people to take so bad about her.. SO nice and SO easy. Cutest lady ever too.
rating_tags: Respected--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Caring

comment: Her lectures are not the best and no phones or laptops at all!.  The entire first month i took heavy notes only to find out we get a study guide. then I filled it out and made an A. The  second and third test i didn't even study or take notes just used the study guide and made A's. VERY VERY EASY CLASS!!! NO NOTES! TAKE HER
rating_tags: BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: The materiali this class seems easy, but i feel like the professor makes it harder than it should be. Her tests are basically her study guides with possibly a few additional questions. She has strict policies and reads straight from the slides. She is a very fast speaker. You can make an A, but you must show up to class and work for it.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Be prepared to actually read and study your book. Her PowerPoints are literally from the book, and she wanted no time on slides for notes. Tests have different forms with different difficulty ranging from study guide to book heavy studying. She will not post PowerPoint online!
rating_tags: Get ready to read--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: This teacher is not fun. You have to show up every day, but she teaches nothing of value that you couldn't get DIRECTLY FROM THE BOOK. I mean she reads directly out of the book, but makes you be there every day. Also her tests don't match her study guide. she has 3 versions of every test and if you don't get the right test, you will fail!
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Read all assingment and you will still have trouble with the quizzes.  They are nitpicky facts from the book.  If you forget to read and she gives a quizzes, there are no chances for makeups and you can actually get a 0.  Tests are also nitpicky.  Most people seem to get C's on tests.  I would advise taking someone elsee.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: She gives a few pop quizzes and if you aren't there you get a 0.  With only 3 a semester, your grade is toast.  Her tests are tricky and picky.  I would take someone else.  She will put you to sleep.  Assigns too much homework and papers.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--BEWARE OF POP QUIZZES

comment: Dr. Rauton is great! Easy A! Take her! She gives you the test in study sessions, and the material is interesting. Her lectures drag a little but you really don't need to listen because she gives you the test at the study session. TAKE HER.

If you're looking to get an easy A, take her. She gives you a study guide & goes over all the answers to it. The tests are an exact replica of the study guides. She marks on the syllabus the days she takes a participation grade, so basically when you're required to show up. Her lectures are long and  you don't learn much  she just tells stories.

Amazing professor. She clearly cares about people in general. I learned a lot of valuable info in her class, especially from guest speakers. Tests are the exact same as the study guide and she gives you all of the study guide answers on review day.

Really easy class, i showed up for attendance and sat there on my phone the entire time and pulled a high B. The tests are just like the study guides, I would look at them 15 minutes before class and still pull a mid B on the tests. Put in 10% effort and you'll make an A.  Unfortunately I only put in 8%, oh well.

Easy class, but going to class was horrible. Long, long lectures that last the whole hour and 15 minutes. Has guest speakers throughout the semester. Study guides exactly like the tests. Not worth taking notes because of the study guides. My notebook was pretty much a bunch of random drawings of anything I could think of. Easy easy class.

Dr. Brown is amazing. She is the sweetest woman you will ever meet. If you get a bad grade on her test, talk to her and she will help you out.  Her tests are the study guides. She is quirky and cute; she is like the sweet grandma you never had. I love her, if you get the chance, take her!!!!!

Dr. Rauton is so sweet. Sometimes she is a little unclear on what she wants, but it is easy to figure out. There were no tests. No final. I literally made a 100 on every assignment except 1 (which I made a 97). Easy A. Take her!

Prefessor Rauton is overall an easy teacher. She gives study guides for all 4 of her tests which means you really dont have to take notes. But she does has participation grades so its necessary to go to class.

Dr. Rauton's class was very boring to me, but definitely easy. 4 tests, one presentation, and attendance grade. She gives study guides that are pretty much identical to the test. Take her if you want an easy A!
Class is mandatory but lecture is awful. I found it extremely hard to try and take notes. She gives study guide which is almost identical to the test! Her class was extremely easy!!

Prof. Rauton is my absolute FAVORITE! She is so sweet and always there if you need help. Her class is an easy A. you have about 4 or 5 tests and the study guide is LITERALLY the test. You have 1 presentation. you don't even have to get the book. Class can get boring but she makes it interesting. It's hard not to get an A in this class. TAKE HER!!

Mrs. Rauton came to Kennesaw this year and she is honestly a sweetheart. Lecture wise, she can be a little boring but she has this bubbliness about her that makes the class bearable. She gives study guides for all of her exams, and they are literally they exact same thing. I don't see how you couldn't get at least on a B on her exams. Love her!
